changelog:
Alpha 3 - Enhanced File Access & Cleaner Navigation

   This update focuses on strengthening file-handling capability with new intent-filter support and refining navigation clarity within the app’s drawer for a smoother overall experience.

⦁ Added:
 ▫ Added intent filter to allow the app to open and read all supported text-based files with read-only access.
 ▫ Added label tags to drawer items for clearer navigation and structure.

⦁ Improved:
 ▫ Drawer scrim color adjusted for better visual clarity and smoother contrast in both light and dark modes.

⦁ Fixed:
 ▫ Corrected release date entries for v23.611.80 alpha1 and v23.611.80 alpha2 in the release history.
 ▫ Corrected changelog search logic that prevented results from displaying when filtering by release date or version.
